name: Gayatri Patil
bio: Passionate about software development and innovation, I'm pursuing a Master's in Computer Science at USC after earning a Bachelor's in Computer Engineering from K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering, graduating with a CGPI of 9.5/10. Through internships and coursework, I've honed skills in Java, Python, and C++, delving into projects like developing web solutions and exploring AI with TensorFlow. With a drive for impactful tech solutions, I've earned recognition in hackathons and aspire to contribute fresh perspectives to the tech industry.
